roleset.name: name
roleset.note: TAG_TEAM-V NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR.

example.name: tag_team-v
example.text: Wife and i tag teamed the yard, finished mowing and trimming right as the rain started!
example.arg: finished mowing and trimming right as the rain started

example.name: tag_team-v
example.text: When his in-ring career resumed, Morris often either tag teamed with his family, or fellow big man André the Giant.
example.arg: with his family, or fellow big man André the Giant
